query: UPDATE users SET email = CONCAT(email, '+', id, '@duplicate.local') WHERE email IN (SELECT email FROM (SELECT email FROM users GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS dups) AND id NOT IN (SELECT MIN(id) FROM (SELECT id, email FROM users) AS t GROUP BY email);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Qn11raqpZKapJrc.584a41145ea0 --database myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA --execute UPDATE users SET email = CONCAT(email, '+', id, '@duplicate.local') WHERE email IN (SELECT email FROM (SELECT email FROM users GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS dups) AND id NOT IN (SELECT MIN(id) FROM (SELECT id, email FROM users) AS t GROUP BY email);
